item.title: Lifetime subscription for Drafts?
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
Drafts pricing information is available on the Drafts Pro page at GetDrafts.com. No lifetime subscription options are listed on that page (or in the in-app purchase options).

The existing subscription is through Apple’s in-app purchasing of subscriptions, so the potetnial options for that are provided/determined by Apple. Lifetime subscription is effectively a souped up version of a one time purchase, the latter being what Greg has moved from. Whilst it might be possible to do it with a coupon code style system (across app versions), or some other approach, there’s probably an additional management overhead for that (outside of Apple’s app subscription/purchasing), and there’s certainly nothing like that offered for Drafts at the moment.
